article_title: EEOC awaits comments on proposed employer-sponsored wellness program rule
article_text:
Employer-sponsored wellness programs may soon be getting some much-needed regulatory clarification.

The Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC) will be publishing proposed regulations how the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) applies to employer-sponsored wellness programs.
